page.title: 01Break Dancing
page.content: {Break dancing}is a 1980's form of dancing.{Break dance}is done on the floor by using your back and nearly every part of your body, but only on the floor. {Body popping}is a kind of movement but not on the floor using your hands and feet making waves up your body. The craze came from the U.S.A. In Scarborough the good breakers go to the {Hip Hop Square.} It is in Town behind the Library and all the best breakers and poppers go there. They bring a very loud tape recorder called a power blaster and play special music. The square walls have lots of specially sprayed grafitti saying things like {Hip Hop {Beat }and{Breaking.}Most breakers wear jackets which are slippy and good for breaking. They are called Mileta, Nike and Riki jackets. It makes a colourful scene.
